name: Undeath Platformer
description:
Here's my entry for The GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022 (theme: Death is only the beginning). The game is included in the WebGL player and the Unity project is also included in a zip file. 

It's a small platformer where you play as a skeleton and the task is to collect twenty diamonds. Be sure to check both the left side and the right side of the map.

Controls: AD / left right for movement, space for jump, tab for pause menu

3rd party assets used:

Lost Crypt - 2D Sample Project by Unity Technologies

Fantasy Wooden GUI: Free by Black Hammer

Handpainted Platform Tileset (Game and Volcano) by Ludo

CC0 Audio from https://gamesounds.xyz/
